title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed
description: Ground of three repeated stripes; the first a solid pale green with small repeat pattern of white  rosebuds, the second, uniformly narrow grey and white stripes, the third a paint moire pattern molette printed in grey on white and overprinted with repeat of pink rosebuds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed. 1967-10-32.
